synopsis: In the first part of their insightful discussion on breakups, hosts Devam and Ahir share personal experiences and reflections, emphasizing the emotional complexities that accompany the end of a relationship. They explore the healing journey, the importance of self-reflection, and the value of seeking support from friends and family during difficult times, ultimately encouraging listeners to embrace their feelings and foster open conversations about mental health.
quotes: To love means to let go.
It's very easy to hold on to the things that give you the most comfort, but the reality is that you have to move on.
The moment I tried to distract myself from my feelings, thatâ€™s when I stopped making progress.
Your feelings are valid, even if they seem small compared to the struggles of others.
Healing means to get to a place where you feel whole by yourself.
I realized that I need to spend time being single and free.
It's okay to talk about your issues, even if you're going through a tough time.
Being around couples can be tough, but it's important to respect your own feelings.
I need to plan less and just live moment to moment.
Music has a way of validating your feelings; it helps you feel what you're feeling.
